pot_grid.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 !  =================================
00002 !
00003 !    3D gather for potential and E-field
00004 !
00005 !  =================================
00006 
00007 subroutine pot_grid
00008 
00009   use treevars
00010 
00011   implicit none
00012 
00013   real, dimension(0:ngx+1,0:ngy+1,0:ngz+1) :: phi_loc, Egx_loc, Egy_loc, Egz_loc, &
00014        g_w, g_w2
00015 
00016   real :: rdx, rdy, rdz, dx, dy, dz, cweight, c_pot
00017   real :: fx1, fx2, fy1, fy2, fz1, fz2, xa, ya, za, fr1
00018   real :: xpmin, ypmin, zpmin, xd,yd,zd
00019   integer :: i, j, k, ng, i1, i2, j1, j2, k1, k2, jfoc, kfoc
00020   character(30) :: cfile
00021   character(5) :: cme
00022   character(6) :: cdump, cvis
00023 
00024   dx = xl/ngx
00025   dy = yl/ngy
00026   dz = zl/ngz
00027   rdx = 1./dx
00028   rdy = 1./dy
00029   rdz = 1./dz
00030 
00031 
00032   !  field box limits: (0-xl, 0-yl, 0-zl)
00033   !  Any particle outside gets put in ghost cells 0, ngx+1
00034 
00035   !      write(15,'(//a,3f12.3)') 'cw,dx,dy',cweight,dx,dy
00036 
00037   phi_loc(0:ngx+1,0:ngy+1,0:ngz+1) = 0.
00038   Egx_loc(0:ngx+1,0:ngy+1,0:ngz+1) = 0.
00039   Egy_loc(0:ngx+1,0:ngy+1,0:ngz+1) = 0.
00040   Egz_loc(0:ngx+1,0:ngy+1,0:ngz+1) = 0.
00041   g_w(0:ngx+1,0:ngy+1,0:ngz+1) = 0.
00042   g_w2(0:ngx+1,0:ngy+1,0:ngz+1) = 0.
00043   xpmin = 0.
00044   ypmin = 0.
00045   zpmin = 0.
00046 
00047   do i=1,npp
00048      xd=(x(i)-xpmin)
00049      yd=(y(i)-ypmin)
00050      zd=(z(i)-zpmin)
00051      xa=xd*rdx
00052      ya=yd*rdy
00053      za=zd*rdz
00054 
00055 
00056      !  indices
00057      i1=xa+1
00058      j1=ya+1
00059      k1=za+1
00060      i1 = min(max(0,i1),ngx+1)
00061      j1 = min(max(0,j1),ngy+1)
00062      k1 = min(max(0,k1),ngz+1)
00063 
00064      fr1 = sqrt(xd**2+yd**2+zd**2+eps**2)
00065      phi_loc(i1,j1,k1)=phi_loc(i1,j1,k1) + pot(i)/fr1 ! NGP 1/r weighting
00066      Egx_loc(i1,j1,k1)=Egx_loc(i1,j1,k1) + ax(i)*m(i)/q(i)/fr1**2
00067      Egy_loc(i1,j1,k1)=Egy_loc(i1,j1,k1) + ay(i)*m(i)/q(i)/fr1**2
00068      Egz_loc(i1,j1,k1)=Egz_loc(i1,j1,k1) + az(i)*m(i)/q(i)/fr1**2
00069      g_w(i1,j1,k1) =  g_w(i1,j1,k1) + 1./fr1  ! Sum S(r) weights
00070      g_w2(i1,j1,k1) =  g_w(i1,j1,k1) + 1./fr1**2  ! Sum S(r) weights
00071 
00072      !  gather charge at nearest grid points
00073 
00074 
00075   end do
00076   g_w(1:ngx,1:ngy,1:ngz) = max(1.,g_w(1:ngx,1:ngy,1:ngz))
00077   g_w2(1:ngx,1:ngy,1:ngz) = max(1.,g_w2(1:ngx,1:ngy,1:ngz))
00078   C_pot = 1.
00079   Egx_loc(1:ngx,1:ngy,1:ngz) = Egx_loc(1:ngx,1:ngy,1:ngz)/ &
00080        (g_w2(1:ngx,1:ngy,1:ngz))  ! Average potential in cell and convert to MV
00081   Egy_loc(1:ngx,1:ngy,1:ngz) = Egy_loc(1:ngx,1:ngy,1:ngz)/ &
00082        (g_w2(1:ngx,1:ngy,1:ngz))
00083   Egz_loc(1:ngx,1:ngy,1:ngz) = Egz_loc(1:ngx,1:ngy,1:ngz)/ &
00084        (g_w2(1:ngx,1:ngy,1:ngz))
00085   phi_loc(1:ngx,1:ngy,1:ngz) = C_pot*phi_loc(1:ngx,1:ngy,1:ngz)/ &
00086        (g_w(1:ngx,1:ngy,1:ngz))
00087 
00088   ng = (ngx+2)*(ngy+2)*(ngz+2)                         ! total # gridpoints
00089   ! Gather sum on root
00090   call MPI_REDUCE(phi_loc, phi_g, ng, MPI_REAL, MPI_SUM, root, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr)
00091   call MPI_REDUCE(Egx_loc, Ex_g, ng, MPI_REAL, MPI_SUM, root, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr)
00092   call MPI_REDUCE(Egy_loc, Ey_g, ng, MPI_REAL, MPI_SUM, root, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr)
00093   call MPI_REDUCE(Egz_loc, Ez_g, ng, MPI_REAL, MPI_SUM, root, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr)
00094 
00095 
00096 end subroutine pot_grid
